item.title: Judge temporarily blocks Trump's executive order on birthright citizenship
item.description: A federal judge in Seattle has signed a temporary restraining order blocking President Donald Trump’s executive order on birthright citizenship.

item.title: Trump says he will 'demand' lower interest rates
item.description: Trump made a virtual address to the World Economic Forum in Davos, Switzerland.

item.title: Trump's definition of 'male,' 'female' criticized by medical and legal experts
item.description: President Trump issued an executive order declaring that the U.S. government would only recognize a person’s sex assigned at birth.

item.title: Teen sentenced to 52 years for deadly stabbing at Taylor Swift-themed event
item.description: Axel Rudakubana has been sentenced to 52 years in prison for fatally stabbing three girls at a children's Taylor Swift-themed event in the United King...

item.title: DOJ orders legal service providers to stop providing support at immigration courts
